CLUE: King Richard 1st had nickname like Latin hero
FOUND IN: Lionheart: A direct reference, as "lion" is associated with bravery in English, much like the Latin word "leo" meaning lion and its historical significance to King Richard I of England (Richard the Lionheart).
Powdery mildew: Characterized by white, powdery spots on leaves and stems caused by various fungi like Blumeria graminis.
